title: DAY 20 Cracking the Code CRT BIAS
description: Advanced concepts on CRT bias, invalidation, precision, and alignment.
content:
In this lesson, you'll learn:

• Aligning bias with higher timeframe structure
• Bias invalidation signals
• Daily bias application on lower timeframes
• Bias strength without liquidity context
• Probability improvement through alignment
• Advanced bias confirmation techniques

quiz.question: Bias should align with:
quiz.explanation: Bias must be based on and confirmed by higher timeframe structural analysis.

quiz.question: Bias invalidates when:
quiz.explanation: Bias is invalidated when the opposite break of structure forms.

quiz.question: Daily bias helps refine:
quiz.explanation: Daily bias provides direction and context for lower timeframe trading decisions.

quiz.question: Bias without liquidity context is:
quiz.explanation: Bias without liquidity alignment is incomplete and lacks high-probability confirmation.

quiz.question: Bias alignment improves:
quiz.explanation: Proper bias alignment dramatically increases win rate and trade probability.
